text: Toto khweshia Itaurati ilimwo obulunjifu nende obulafu, Eya Abarumwa babusilinjakhwo balia abasuubila, Abayahudi, nende Abasirasoti nende Abasomi ne eshichila benyekha okhuliinda eshitabu shia Nyasaye. Mana nibaba abaloli khu shio. Kho mularia Abandu tawe, halali murie esie. Ne mulakalukhania tsinyaali tsianje khu bukusi obutiti tawe. Ne balia balabusinjia okhwikhoonyela aka Nyasaye yeshia tawe, abo nibo Abakhayi
